title: From the Vault: Whispers of the Speaking Sword
itunes:title: From the Vault: Whispers of the Speaking Sword
description:
Weapons capable of thought, speech and autonomous action appear throughout multiple myths and legends. In this classic episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe explore some stand-out examples and discuss what it all might mean. (originally published 7/29/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
